note: Volume 1 Number 1 of The BeZine (TheBeZine.com) came out on October 31, 2014. We are now in our tenth year, evolved from a monthly to a quarterly, covering four themes a year: sustainABILITY, Waging Peace, Social Justice, and Life of the Spirit and Activism. We welcome submissions with perspectives expressed respectfully through literature—poetry, fiction, creative nonfiction—and the arts—music, visual art, videos, photography, and reviews (TheBeZine.com/submission-guidelines).

name: The BeZine
value: https://TheBeZine.com/
